{{cpp/regex/match_results/title|suffix}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
const_reference suffix() const;
}}

Obtains a reference to the {{lc|std::sub_match}} object representing the target sequence between the end of the entire match of the regular expression and the end of the target sequence.

{{cpp/precondition|{{rlpf|ready}} must be {{c|true}}.}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Reference to the unmatched suffix.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

int main()
{
    std::regex re("a(a)*by");
    std::string target("baaaby123");
    std::smatch sm;

    std::regex_search(target, sm, re);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; sm.suffix() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=123
}}
